comment.author: Kelsey
comment.text: ALL the math shows Hillary winning, however, the largest amount of votes come from tomorrow's ballots! VOTE 100% democrat, VOTE large and donate NOW. Today and tomorrow are the last days to ensure a victory. Don't forget, we need the house and senate too. Vote 100% democrat on your ballot. :D GO HILLARY!

replies.author: Kelsey
replies.text: lmao! NO, republican we won't. So sad with the living in a bubble. Aww :(
